data.title: Pharmacy Label & Inventory Solutions
data.meta_description: Our labeling products, seen in our medical labeling and barcode kits, assure clear prescription information for best practices, and better results for patients.
data.text:
Auto-Wrap® Syringe Label System

Fast Print Speeds: Automatically Label 20 Syringes Per Minute

MPI’s Auto-Wrap® Syringe Labeling System automates the syringe labeling process, helping our customers increase their throughput while reducing the risk of repetitive stress injuries among their staff. Compatible with nearly any type of oral or injectable syringe from ½ mL up to 60 mL, Auto-Wrap delivers time savings, enhanced precision, and ease of operation. This product includes our Pak-EDGE® Barcode Labeling Software for optimal efficiency.

Learn More

Pharmacy Accessory Label Printer (PALP)

Enhanced Accuracy with Thermal Transfer & Direct Thermal Label Printers

The Pharmacy Accessory Label Printer (PALP) from MPI, with our Pak-EDGE® Barcode Labeling Software included, is a top-quality label printing solution for pharmacy accessories, vials, ampoules, syringes, and much more. The direct thermal printer / thermal transfer printer allows our clients to print quality drug labels in six different sizes and colors. Our PALP delivers a range of printing capabilities with multiple barcode formats, different sizes, enhanced security, and many options for pharmacy label sizes.

Learn More

Improve Efficiency & Patient Care

Wholesalers, repackagers, and pharmacies often struggle with manually labeling large quantities of syringes, vials, and ampoules. This can lead to excessive costs associated with medication errors, and efficiency problems. With MPI’s labeling solutions, your packaged medication will be labeled with speed, reliability, and accuracy to follow strict compliance standards. Overall, our labeling products assist in improving patient safety.

Prescription Label Printer Advanced Technology

The MPI print processes are unmatched when it comes to solving issues like:

Inefficiency

Labeling Errors

Compliance Issues

Our high-tech and flexible solutions ensure these problems are fixed, and your specific needs are met seamlessly. We also have many other products to improve efficiency and patient care such as oral solid packaging, oral liquid packaging, overwrapping solutions, and barcode labeling software.

Custom Solutions for the Healthcare Industry

MPI’s products are customizable to best suit your medical packaging needs. You can utilize a combination of our products depending on what you need to operate more efficiently. We serve many different healthcare clients facing unique challenges. The Auto-Wrap machine is perfect for pharmacies that need to label substantial amounts of oral syringes such as a children’s hospital. Our PALP machine will excel at printing accurate, efficient, and durable labels for clients needing medication labels for syringes, vials, ampoules, or a combination of these. Our customer success team will ensure that you can integrate these machines into your current processes with ease.
